Package org.arl.fjage.rmi

Support for multi-container deployments using RMI.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RemoteContainer
    RMI interface for remote containers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Gateway
    Gateway to communicate with agents from Java classes.
    MasterContainer
    Master container supporting multiple remote slave containers.
    RemoteContainerProxy
    RMI proxy to avoid having MasterContainer and SlaveContainer implement the UnicastRemoteObject interface.
    SlaveContainer
    Slave container attached to a master container.

Package org.arl.fjage.rmi Description

Support for multi-container deployments using RMI.
